title: FACT CHECK: Are Pickle-Flavored Peeps Coming To A Store Near You?
author: checkyourfact.com
vclaim:
An image shared on Facebook by the page Appalachian Memes claimed that a new line of Peeps marshmallow treats would be pickle-flavored.

The public relations company that represents the Peeps brand told The Daily Caller that pickle-flavored Peeps are not for sale or in the works.

Sold in a variety of shapes and flavors, Peeps are a popular candy treat enjoyed around Easter. However, shoppers looking for pickle-flavored marshmallows will be disappointed.

“It is not in the works, nor was it available this year. This year we have other interesting flavors such as Root Beer and Pancakes & Syrup, but no pickle,” Sara Semple of Coyne PR, which represents Peeps, told the Caller.

According to a press release issued by Just Born Quality Confections, Peeps is also offering their traditional marshmallows in flavors like cotton candy, orange sherbet dipped in creme-flavored fudge and, at select retailers, blue raspberry and chocolate caramel swirl.

The image appears to be a photoshopped version of the basic green marshmallows that the company offers.
